Package com.weatherAPI.weatherApplication.controller

Class WeatherForecastController

java.lang.Object
com.weatherAPI.weatherApplication.controller.WeatherForecastController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/weather") public class WeatherForecastController extends Object
REST controller for managing weather forecasts.

This controller provides an API endpoint for retrieving weather forecasts for specific days across all available stations. It delegates the logic to the WeatherForecastService.

  • Method Details

    • getWeatherForecastForDay

      @GetMapping("/forecast") public List<Map<String,Object>> getWeatherForecastForDay(@RequestParam String day)
      Retrieves the weather forecast for a specific day across all stations.
      Parameters:
      day - the day for which the forecast is requested (e.g., "Monday")
      Returns:
      a list of maps containing the forecast details, or a message if no data is available
